message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you.  I'm asking for $14,000 to start. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. Could we possibly meet in the middle?
Hi Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your position, but $10,000 is just too low for me to consider. Could you meet me at $12,000?
